title: It's finally here
body:
As I come home and lay down, computer at my grasp, I turn it on and immediately open league of legends. I notice it has a small update, probably nothing much, I open up my browser and do my internet things ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°). I soon hear the sound of the update finishing and the launch button appears before me. I click it. I says yes, then yes again. I log in, while gazing at the sexy man on-screen ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°). I am then brought to the main screen where I then click play to begin my league journey for the day. But. Something greets me. Big bold yellow letters gazing into my eyes as I read these magnificent words clearly. Then I realise. I prepare my anus for what's to come....

Ultra Rapid Fire, it's finally here....

http://imgur.com/vJZobBM

replies.body: idk if this guys trolling, but URF actually isnt appearing in my client!!! SAVE ME!!! It updated and everything but ITS NOT THERE!!!

> [{quoted}](name=PineappleReject,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6NXAwAEy,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-04-22T16:39:41.944+0000)
>
> idk if this guys trolling, but URF actually isnt appearing in my client!!! SAVE ME!!! It updated and everything but ITS NOT THERE!!!

URF is indeed live! Are you having trouble finding it in client?
tbh URF is one of the worst modes. Same 5 champions every game and people taking it way more seriously than they're meant to.
Creating a custom and laying down some ground rules is the best way to avoid this. (e.g no maokai/shaco or do an all melee team or even play it on HA)

Dang. That's the problem staying on the NA server since I'll be returning there in a couple months. Have to wait until it opens up there in 6 or so hours. Tear of the Goddess and all that. Guess I'll watch naughty videos until then.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BBGEG21CGo0

URF
Oh my god is it URF
Oh yes it really is URF
Lets all 
just reeejoooiiice

Return of URF? No, this is what I like to call:

The Glorious Return of URF!!!

Oh how we missed you, please be on for two weeks, Rito plz. (They're not going to :( )
